entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet --version leads to Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #87100
  • AVX512 masking support #87097
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add stream support to IDbConnection #87092
  • `mcs.exe -dumpMap` failing to print all the methods #87086
    8.0.0
  • Question: Thread safety of X509Certificate2 class #87085

Closed

  • JIT: fgLateDevirtualization should try and simplify type compares #11436
    Future
  • Cannot initialize array of non-primitive type #86865
  • [wasm] Failures in System.Numerics.Vectors and System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests #83792
    8.0.0
  • WASM C APIs need a rooting audit #61008
    Future
  • netcore ignores client certificate when using TLS 1.2 #85077
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fold obj.GetType to a constant #87101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary suppressions in APICompat files #87094
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Ensure JsonSerializerOptions always returns a JsonTypeInfo for `object`. #87093
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve codegen for AVX-512 comparisons and general handling of `TYP_MASK` #87089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Handle diagnostic port configuration in NativeAOT #87088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Add back fixed xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #87084
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Unify trim warnings for accessing compiler generated code #86816
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87019
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [RISC-V] Sync comment and implementation #87033
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • enable DATAS config via runtimeconfig.json #87034
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Dispose of linked CTS in QuicListener #87057
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Remove dependency on definition of MonoClass #87077
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.Json AOT tests due to crashes #87079
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add and use ConfigureAwaitOptions #87067
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline TLS field access for linux #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable identical code folding on Linux #87045
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't enable ILLink analyzers for unsupported TFMs #87071
    area-Meta
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
